content: **materials** - yarn 100g 3 5 oz 4 ply knitting worsted - hook 4 00mm g-6 **designer s notes ** will fit most women and teens this hat covers your ears so should be great for keeping you warm in the cold weather thanks to sarah for this size tip i also made one for my 1 year old by using a size e hook and sport weight yarn it looks sooooo cute on her
